name: Pleen
description:
Fast-Paced Short Action Platformer, kill stuff, stack critical chance, DASH to avoid damage and DONT GET HIT.

This is a short game that i started to learn how to draw and animate pixel art, it was my first time drawing my stuff. Four days after i started the project, the FFS GameJam opened up and i submited to it with the project.

Its actually a prototype, there are 2 levels and a boss fight. It's a hard game, requires some training to get to the boss and killing it. So if you are into hard games, i think you should try it out.

A sample of the gameplay:


---I Highly recommend the desktop downloadable version---

                   I have built a WebGL version to easier showcase for the GameJam, but somethings, UI mostly is a little weird.

You basically kill stuff, stack critical chance, dash through enemies to avoid damage.

The game was made during a 34 days period.  This game is my first finished game, i've wrote every single line of code from scratch, drawn and animated all the assets.

If you liked, follow me on my twitter to see recent updates and projects

https://twitter.com/BodeDev

Controls

-Move -- A and D

-Dash/Dodge -- Left-Shift or Left-Control (Invulnerable while dashing) - CORE MECHANIC

-Shoot -- Left or Right Mouse Button
-Aim -- Mouse Pointer sets which side you shoot(not the directional keys)
-Jump -- Space
-Grenade -- G
-Drop Down Platforms -- S

Mechanics

- Every third shot is a critical shot, unless you get hit, this will reset the counter.
- Every landed crit gives you 10 CP, you gain +10% critical chance every 100 CP
- You loose all your CP and the critical chance acumulated if you get hit
- Your grenades costs 30 Resources to throw
- Critical Multiplier and Maximum Resources can be upgraded with pickups
- Every critical hit landed restores 5 resources.
